name: Fin Finger Vibrator
about: What it is:A versatile finger vibrator that adds stimulation to your intimate touch while an optional tether gives you second nature seamlessness..Highlighted Features:- Medical-Grade Silicone.What Else You Need to Know:Finu2018s body is designed to be held between two fingersu2014with or without its detachable tetheru2014and is asymmetrical so it feels different on each end. To add vibration to your direct touch, you can flip Fin above the hand or slide it to the base of your fingers..Device Size:2.75 (with strap) x 1d.This Device Comes With:- Fin Vibrator
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Using Fin:.-Please fully charge your Fin before use. .-Fin has one button for power and intensities. ..Charging Fin:.-Battery life (high intensity/steady mode): 1.5 hours..-Charge time: Two hours..-The first time you charge Fin youu2019ll need to puncture the silicone with the provided USB cable, then plug the USB into any 5V USB power supply (such as a computer or the kind that comes with most phones)..-The LED indicator is located near the charging port. The LED will blink green when Fin is charging and turn solid when charging is complete..-When Finu2019s battery starts to get low the LED will blink red. When the battery is completely drained the LED will blink red once when you press the button...Travel Mode:.-Fin canu2019t be turned on accidentally while in Travel Mode. .-Hold the button for 10 seconds to activate Travel Modeu2014the LED will blink for those 10 seconds and flash red at the end. .-To exit Travel Mode, just plug Fin in to charge...Caring for Fin:.-Fin is splash-proof. .-Clean Fin after every use using either a damp cloth or a water-based sex toy cleaner like Dameu2019s Hand & Vibe Cleaner (sold separately). .-Dry Fin thoroughly. .-Store Fin separately from other toys and away from extreme heat or cold. .-You can store Fin in the linen bag provided...Caution:.-Do not use silicone-based lube with Fin..-Do not clean with products containing petroleum or acetone..-Do not boil, bake, microwave, or run through the dishwasher..-Do not submerge in water; Fin is splash-proof, not waterproof.

The sound is a little louder than bigger vibrators so I'd recommend using it alone in your room. It has a clicking vibration sound instead of a normal buzz which I can't tell if I like more or not. But all in all I'd recommend this if you're looking for something to use with a partner or to use by yourself discreetly!
